snippet: A new exhibition, “Night Lights at Wave Hill,” pays homage to the 50th anniversary of the 28-acre public garden and cultural center in the Bronx.
abstract: New exhibition called Night Lights at Wave Hill aims to raise awareness of historic Hudson River estate in Riverdale section of the Bronx, which features stunning gardens and had thriving artistic life in the 1970s and '80s; centerpiece of $250,000 exhibition, which celebrates estate's 50th anniversary, is installation by Chris Doyle.
lead_paragraph: A new exhibition, “Night Lights at Wave Hill,” pays homage to the 50th anniversary of the 28-acre public garden and cultural center in the Bronx.

headline.main: Wave Hill Puts Spotlight on Art to Celebrate Its Gardens and Lure Visitors
headline.print_headline: Bronx Estate Puts Spotlight on Art to Celebrate Its Gardens and Lure Visitors
